ValidationRule.description: The user in the Implementation Specialist field can only edit Implementation Specialist Name, Client Run Date, and Expected Audit Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR($RecordType.Name = 'MPSC Employee Audit',$RecordType.Name = 'MPSC Client Audit') && Record_Locked__c && NOT(ISCHANGED( Implementation_Specialist_Name__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED( Client_Run_Date__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED( Expected_Audit_Completion_Date__c)) && ($User.FirstName = Implementation_Specialist_Name__r.FirstName) && ($User.LastName = Implementation_Specialist_Name__r.LastName)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to edit these fields on this record.
